Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals the Empire state film production credit and the Empire state film post production credit
Summary: Repeals the Empire state film production credit and the Empire state film post production credit.
LawCode: Rpld §§24 & 31, §210-B sub 1 ¶(b) sub¶ (ii) cl (E), subs 20 & 32, §606 sub (a) ¶2 sub¶ (B) cl (v), sub§ (i) ¶1 sub¶ (B) cls (xxii) & (xxxi), sub§§ (gg) & (qq), §1201-A subs (b) & (c), Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal certain provisions of the tax law, relating to the Empire state film production credit and the Empire state film post production credit
